description: Consistent arcs in a tournament (equals C(n,2) - A003141).
references: J.-C. Bermond, Ordres a` distance minimum d'un tournoi et graphs partiels sans circuits maximaux, Math. Sci. Hum., No. 37 (1972), 5-25.
K. B. Reid, On sets of arcs containing no cycles in tournaments, Canad. Math. Bull., 12 (1969), 261-264.
N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: N. J. A. Sloane and K. B. Reid, Correspondence concerning this sequence

author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
